data.title: Sophie, Duchess of Edinburgh
data.meta_description: Sophie, Duchess of Edinburgh, is married to Prince Edward.
data.text:
Sophie, Duchess of Edinburgh, is married to Prince Edward.

Sophies met her future husband, the youngest child of the Queen and Prince Philip, while running her own PR agency.

She and Prince Edward married in 1999 and the couple have two children, Lady Louise and James, Earl of Wessex.

Sophie, previously known as the Countess of Wessex, became Duchess of Edinburgh on her husband's 59th birthday when King Charles III granted him their late father's title.
